class.name: SubtweenTweener
class.description: [SubtweenTweener] is used to execute a [Tween] as one step in a sequence defined by another [Tween]. See [method Tween.tween_subtween] for more usage information. [b]Note:[/b] [method Tween.tween_subtween] is the only correct way to create [SubtweenTweener]. Any [SubtweenTweener] created manually will not function correctly.

method.name: set_delay
method.description: Sets the time in seconds after which the [SubtweenTweener] will start running the subtween. By default there's no delay.
